rooms.name: standart king
rooms.aboutText1: Experience a haven of tranquility within our spacious 'Standard King' rooms, meticulously designed to offer a seamless blend of modernity and comfort. Adorned with contemporary décor and thoughtfully curated amenities, these rooms embody the essence of relaxation.
rooms.aboutText2: Indulge in the lavish comfort of a king-size bed, ensuring a restful night's sleep after a day of exploration or business engagements. The room's layout is intelligently crafted to maximize space and functionality, providing a cozy seating area perfect for unwinding or catching up on work.
rooms.roomInfo: Feel the comfort and relax at Rooftop Apart Hotel Yerevan. Let us introduce one of our rooms of Standard category. Free Wi-Fi, delicious view and perfectly designed rooms are waiting for you.
